item.title: Full Stack Notes
item.description: Full Stack Notes ###Docker Machine docker-machine ls docker-machine ssh <MACHINE-NAME> docker-machine ip <MACHINE-NAME> Basic workflow: docker-machine start <MACHINE-NAME> docker-machine env <MACHINE-NAME> eval $(docker-machine env <MACHINE-NAME>) docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up -d --build Docker Compose Build the images: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml build Run the containers: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d Stop the containers: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml stop Run a commant in container docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run users <TERMINAL-COMMAND> Docker docker exec -ti users-db psql -U postgres -W

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post for my blog. ifdsf
